# Sudden Disguise (Ninja Trick)
## Overview
*Sudden Disguise (Su):* As a swift action, a ninja can change her appearance for 1 minute per level. This ability functions as *[[Disguise Self (Spell)|disguise self]].* Each use of this ability uses up 1 ki point.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 16
